name: Morphing Presets
description: Smooth preset morphing transitioning between different instrument combinations

performance.notes: Smooth preset morphing between instrument combinations. Bars 1-12: Piano + Strings (classical duo). Bars 13-24: Morph to Strings + Choir (ethereal pad). Piano fades out, choir fades in. Bars 25-36: Morph to Brass + Woodwind (wind ensemble). Strings/choir fade out, brass/woodwind fade in. Bars 37-48: Morph to All Instruments (full orchestra). All instruments equal volume (0.5). Bars 49-60: Return to Piano + Strings. Others fade out, piano/strings return. Smooth crossfades create evolving timbre. Each preset has different character. Demonstrates morphing capabilities.
performance.technique: Define presets with instrument volumes. Morph between presets using crossfades. Smooth transitions = 8-16 bars. Fade out old instruments, fade in new instruments. Each preset = different character. Cycle through presets for variety.
performance.structure: Bars 1-12: Piano + Strings (classical). Bars 13-24: Strings + Choir (ethereal). Bars 25-36: Brass + Woodwind (wind). Bars 37-48: All Instruments (full). Bars 49-60: Return to Piano + Strings.
performance.tip: 8-16 bars = smooth morph. Fade out old, fade in new. Each preset = unique character. Cycle through presets = evolution. Return to start = resolution.
